page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION TO KENNINGTON
page.content: Twenty years ago,Kennington was a relatively small village on the out- skirts of Ashford. The area was nearly all agricultural land. Most people worked on the land or in Ashford. Since then, the whole area has grown in population as more and more people have moved from cities like{LONDON. This has meant the building of many houses, council and private. {KENNINGTON}has thus had many housing estates built on what was farmland. So our village has changed from a small rural village above the floodplain of the River Stour to a fairly desnsely populated residential area. This has necessitated the building of new shools, shops and other amenities. The land around all these houses is mostly good quality agricultural land.
